title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of C programming. It covers topics such as variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the world of algorithms with this introductory course. Learn about sorting, searching, and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: This course introduces C++ programming in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Get hands-on experience with C++ and DSA concepts.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn the basics of data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand how to implement and use them in your programs.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Discover the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python. Explore classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Software Engineering
details: Delve into the world of software engineering. Learn about software development methodologies, requirements engineering, and more.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing technologies. Understand cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Get hands-on experience with MySQL databases. Learn about SQL, database design, querying, and management.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Solve coding challenges, algorithmic problems, and improve your coding skills.
